title: Dinner Tonight: Sopa de Ajo (Garlic Soup) Recipe
full_text:
Dinner Tonight: Sopa de Ajo (Garlic Soup) Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
30 mins
Total
30 mins
Serves
3 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
tablespoons
olive oil
1/4
pound
stale bread
, crusts removed, cut into 1/2 inch cubes
4
garlic
cloves
, minced
1/2
teaspoon
hot pimentón (Spanish smoked paprika)
Salt
4
cups
chicken stock
3
poached eggs
Directions
Pour the olive oil into a pot. Turn the heat to medium-high and add the cubed bread. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring often, until the bread is lightly browned. Toss in the garlic, pimentón, and a pinch of salt. Stir well, and cook for 3 minutes.
Pour in the stock, bring to a boil, then reduce heat to a simmer. Cook for 15 minutes.
Poach the eggs.
Follow this guide
.
Ladle some soup into a bowl and top with a poached egg.
Soups
